apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

image.description: Image is the name of the image repository

interval.description:
Interval is the length of time to wait between
scans of the image repository.

policy.description:
Policy gives the particulars of the policy to be followed in
selecting the most recent image

alphabetical.description: Alphabetical set of rules to use for alphabetical ordering of the tags.

order.description:
Order specifies the sorting order of the tags. Given the letters of the
alphabet as tags, ascending order would select Z, and descending order
would select A.

semver.description:
SemVer gives a semantic version range to check against the tags
available.

range.description:
Range gives a semver range for the image tag; the highest
version within the range that's a tag yields the latest image.

secretRef.description:
SecretRef can be given the name of a secret containing
credentials to use for the image registry. The secret should be
created with `kubectl create secret docker-registry`, or the
equivalent.

name.description:
Name of the referent.
This field is effectively required, but due to backwards compatibility is
allowed to be empty. Instances of this type with an empty value here are
almost certainly wrong.
More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/names/#names

suspend.description:
This flag tells the controller to suspend subsequent image scans.
It does not apply to already started scans. Defaults to false.

tagName.description: TagName is the tag ref that needs to be put in manifest to replace fields

canonicalImageName.description:
CanonicalName is the name of the image repository with all the
implied bits made explicit; e.g., `docker.io/library/alpine`
rather than `alpine`.

lastTransitionTime.description: Last time the condition transitioned from one status to another.

lastUpdateTime.description: The last time this condition was updated.

message.description: Human-readable message indicating details about last transition

reason.description: The reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: Status of the condition, one of True, False, Unknown.

lastScanTime.description: LastScanTime is the last time image was scanned

latestDigest.description: LatestDigest is the digest of latest tag

latestImage.description:
LatestImage gives the first in the list of images scanned by
the image repository, when filtered and ordered according to
the policy.

latestTag.description: Latest tag is the latest tag filtered by the policy

description: JSON Schema for ImageScan (v1alpha1) in group fleet.cattle.io.
title: ImageScan v1alpha1
